title: can mozilla save auto passwords?
content: Hi, can someone tell me that Mozilla saves our password as i am working on a website best kitchen products and i want to save my login info when I login into my website at autofill is this option work on Mozilla. i am using since the last 7 days but it is not saving. anyone can guide me thanks in advance
creator: kitchentrendy420

title: mozilla showing "Your tab just crashed" message
content: i m keep getting the same message on my mozilla browser on the laptop. "Gah. Your tab just crashed. We can help" with Close Tab button and Restore This Tab button, none of them are helpful. even if a open a new tab same this appears. i tried reinstalling the mozilla, deleted all the files in the C drive, then reinstall it, same this appear again. even if i try to open the get help site of mozilla same this appears. need help fast.
creator: 7503795003ajay

title: subtitles out of sync in streaming services
content:
Hello, I am finding that Firefox display incorrectly and out of sync the subtitles in streaming services like Hulu or Amazon Video. Subtitles dialogs appear around ten seconds before the actual audio plays that dialog. It doesn't occur when I am using Chrome.

Thanks.
creator: dmbaber

title: Disabling https mode
content: Despite trying to disable https mode, Firefox will not allow ordinary http sites to load. Consequently I can't access most of the Australian Bureau of Meteorology (bom.gov.au) pages or any other websites that don't use the extra 's' but are still secure. Mozilla suggested switching from Strict back to Standard but I still can't access ordinary http sites. Can anyone help, please?
creator: ronaylon
